title: Anxious Remco Evenepoel Forced to Miss ‘Big Goals’ Following Crash, Names First Targets of 2025
content:
‘It's often easy to put on a smile in front of the cameras, but behind the scenes it’s still painful and difficult,' says Evenepoel.

Read the full article at Anxious Remco Evenepoel Forced to Miss ‘Big Goals’ Following Crash, Names First Targets of 2025 on Velo.
author: sstokes
